backend/main.mo: Main actor defining customer, service, AMC, revenue, and reminder types with storage maps, ID counters, access control, and mixins for storage and authorization.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module providing old/new type definitions and data structures for upgrading AMC payment methods and customer records.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing updated frontend files and components related to restricting payment methods and syncing UI with backend changes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend component, hook, and page in the application.
frontend/DEPLOYMENT.md: Deployment checklist covering AMC tab visibility, currency formatting, authentication flow, and build steps.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables for themes, charts, and layout with light and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point setting up the root container and loading the main React bundle.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, data loading validation, error boundaries, and rendering the dashboard or login prompt.
frontend/src/components/AddAMCContractDi: Provides a dialog for selecting customers and creating new AMC contracts with validation and submission via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AddAMCServiceEnt: Dialog form to add a service entry under an AMC contract, including optional parts and price reduction details.
frontend/src/components/AddCustomerDialo: Form dialog to create a new customer with optional AMC contract details and validation before submitting.
frontend/src/components/AddReminderDialo: Dialog for creating service reminders linked to a customer, validating inputs and submitting to backend.
frontend/src/components/AddServiceEntryD: Form dialog to add a regular service entry with service type, payment details, and notes, then submit via mutation.
frontend/src/components/AMCBadge.tsx: UI badge component displaying AMC type labels with dynamic colors using helper metadata.
frontend/src/components/AMCTab.tsx: Displays all AMC contracts by fetching customers, flattening their contracts, and rendering them in a table with an option to add new AMC entries.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches rendering errors and shows a fallback UI with reload and back buttons.
frontend/src/components/CustomerDetailDi: Dialog for viewing and editing full customer details, including service history, AMC data, and customer updates.
frontend/src/components/CustomerList.tsx: Sortable customer table with selection, multi-delete, and basic info display including AMC and service dates.
frontend/src/components/CustomersTab.tsx: Main customer management view supporting filtering, search, import, deletion, and opening customer dialogs.
frontend/src/components/DashboardOvervie: Dashboard cards summarizing customer counts, services, reminders, and warranty stats with filter navigation.
frontend/src/components/EditServiceEntry: Dialog to edit a service entry’s date, type, payment info, notes, and save updates.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer showing © notice and link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders the main header with branding, theme toggle, and authenticated user menu including logout handling.
frontend/src/components/ImportPreviewMod: Displays a dialog showing parsed CSV customer data with validity status and allows confirming the import.
frontend/src/components/LoginPrompt.tsx: Shows a landing page with feature highlights and triggers login via Internet Identity.
frontend/src/components/MarkServiceDoneD: Modal to mark a reminder’s service as completed and auto‑calculate the next reminder date.
frontend/src/components/RemindersTab.tsx: Lists reminders by filter, supports sending WhatsApp messages, and opens dialogs for adding or completing reminders.
frontend/src/components/RevenueAnalytics: Provides revenue analytics with monthly, quarterly, yearly, AMC, customer, and payment method breakdowns.
frontend/src/components/ServicesTab.tsx: Displays and filters service entries, handles add/edit/delete dialogs, and updates payment status using query hooks.
frontend/src/components/ThemeToggle.tsx: Button component that toggles between light and dark themes.
frontend/src/components/UserManagementTa: Empty placeholder file for future user management UI.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Empty placeholder hook for future auth logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity management, and an authentication context.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for customers, services, reminders, and admin checks using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles with light/dark theme CSS variables and global styles.
frontend/src/lib/amc.ts: Utility functions mapping AMC types and contract statuses to labels and UI styling info.
frontend/src/lib/fyQuarter.ts: Defines financial year quarters and helpers to compute current quarter and its months.
frontend/src/lib/phoneNormalization.ts: Normalizes Indian mobile numbers to E.164 format and converts them to WhatsApp-compatible digit strings.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Common utilities for class merging, date formatting from nanoseconds, and INR currency formatting.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, React Query, Internet Identity provider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/Dashboard.tsx: Implements the dashboard page with tab navigation and filter handlers for customers, services, reminders, revenue, and AMC tabs.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters, including hash routing support.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration extending theme colors, layout, animations, and enabling typography, container-query, and animation plugins.
project_state.json: Project state describing revenue-related updates, limiting payment methods to UPI and Cash and listing related feature requests.
